rules_text:
Third Act [i](If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.)[/i]
When this enchantment enters, mill four cards. Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token for each creature card milled this way.
Skeletons you control get +1/+1 as long as you're in your third act.
